content: solely something i wanted to share with you all please share your versions on ravelry and/or instagram with #thescrapbag and tag me because i would love to see them i am on instagram and ravelry @shecraftslove if you have any questions please dm me on instagram or email me shecraftslove@gmail com thank you ♡ anabelle abbreviations super special thank you to my proof-readers bor beginning of round @fall_knits rs right side @cottonknotatelier ws wrong side @katknits2902 @whoknitwhat @maypuff knits 3
